prompt:
Generate a full-body, front-view portrait of character protagonist based on the following description, with a pure white background. The character should be centered in the image, occupying most of the frame. Gazing straight ahead. Standing with arms relaxed at sides. Natural expression.
Features: a young man with divine beauty, standing full-body in pure white background, centered, impressionist oil painting style with rich light and shadow variations and visible brushstrokes. He has an ethereally handsome face, featuring delicate and symmetrical bone structure. His skin glows with a warm, sun-kissed golden luminescence, as if lit from within. His eyes are large, almond-shaped, and hold the depth of a clear dawn sky, shimmering with flecks of gold and amber, reflecting high intelligence and profound empathy. His eyebrows are finely arched. His nose is straight and elegant. His lips are well-defined, with a gentle, compassionate curve, often holding a serene, thoughtful expression that radiates immense natural charm. His hair is long, flowing like liquid sunlight, cascading past his shoulders in soft, luminous waves of pale gold and honey-blonde strands, interwoven with subtle highlights resembling sunbeams. He is dressed in elegant, ancient-Greek-inspired attire that blends divinity with elegance: a white chiton made of soft, light-as-air linen, draped gracefully over one shoulder, secured with a golden cord. A himation of sheer, iridescent gold-tinged fabric is wrapped around his waist and over his arm, shimmering softly. His physique is lean yet toned, suggesting both grace and high physical prowess. His entire being is surrounded by a gentle, radiant aura of pure light, and faint, shimmering particles of golden dust float around him, symbolizing his 'Dawn Force'. The overall atmosphere is ethereal, serene, and beautifully delicate, fitting the game's aesthetic. no text, no symbols, no garbled characters, no words., full body, standing pose, arms relaxed at sides, pure white background, character centered, no text, no symbols, no garbled characters, no words
Style: oil_painting
No text, no symbols, no watermark, no garbled characters, no words.
